languages.text: {n}Движения грызуна, от взмахов хвоста до жонглирования шариками, точно подчиняются безмолвным командам музыканта. Ноты, паузы, ритмы — все, из чего состоит мелодия, — являются указаниями для маленького ассистента флейтиста.{/n}

{n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Движения грызуна, от взмахов хвоста до жонглирования шариками, точно подчиняются безмолвным командам музыканта. Ноты, паузы, ритмы — все, из чего состоит мелодия, — являются указаниями для маленького ассистента флейтиста.{/n}

{n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tous les mouvements du rat, que ce soit les battements de sa queue ou la direction dans laquelle il doit pousser la bille, obéissent scrupuleusement aux ordres muets de son maître. Les notes, les pauses, le rythme... Chaque aspect de la mélodie est en fait un signal adressé directement à l'assistant miniature du joueur de flûte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tous les mouvements du rat, que ce soit les battements de sa queue ou la direction dans laquelle il doit pousser la bille, obéissent scrupuleusement aux ordres muets de son maître. Les notes, les pauses, le rythme... Chaque aspect de la mélodie est en fait un signal adressé directement à l'assistant miniature du joueur de flûte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los movimientos de la rata, desde las sacudidas del rabo hasta el momento y el lugar en que hace rodar las bolas, responden a las órdenes de su amo con asombrosa precisión. Las notas, las pausas, la cadencia... los distintos componentes de la melodía son señales para la diminuta ayudante del flautista.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los movimientos de la rata, desde las sacudidas del rabo hasta el momento y el lugar en que hace rodar las bolas, responden a las órdenes de su amo con asombrosa precisión. Las notas, las pausas, la cadencia... los distintos componentes de la melodía son señales para la diminuta ayudante del flautista.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尻尾の振り方からボールを押すタイミングや位置まで、ネズミの動きは主人の言葉もない命令に驚くほど正確に従っていた。音符、間、リズム…メロディのひとつひとつが、フルート吹きのちょっとしたアシスタントに対する合図となっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尻尾の振り方からボールを押すタイミングや位置まで、ネズミの動きは主人の言葉もない命令に驚くほど正確に従っていた。音符、間、リズム…メロディのひとつひとつが、フルート吹きのちょっとしたアシスタントに対する合図となっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老鼠的动作，从尾巴的轻拍到推球的时间、位置，都以不可思议的精确进行着，服从着主人无言的命令。笛声的旋律、停顿、节奏……音乐的每个部分都在向吹笛人的小助手传达着命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老鼠的动作，从尾巴的轻拍到推球的时间、位置，都以不可思议的精确进行着，服从着主人无言的命令。笛声的旋律、停顿、节奏……音乐的每个部分都在向吹笛人的小助手传达着命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bewegungen der Ratte, vom Schwanz bis dahin, wann und wohin sie die Kugeln schiebt, gehorchen den wortlosen Befehlen ihres Meisters mit unheimlicher Präzision. Die Noten, die Pausen, der Rhythmus – jedes Element der Melodie dient als Signal für den winzigen Assistenten des Flötenspielers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bewegungen der Ratte, vom Schwanz bis dahin, wann und wohin sie die Kugeln schiebt, gehorchen den wortlosen Befehlen ihres Meisters mit unheimlicher Präzision. Die Noten, die Pausen, der Rhythmus – jedes Element der Melodie dient als Signal für den winzigen Assistenten des Flötenspielers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıçanın kuyruğunu hafifçe vurmasından tut da topları ne zaman ve nereye iteceğine kadarki tüm hareketleri, efendisinin söze dökmediği emirlerine benzeri görülmemiş bir hassasiyetle itaat ediyor. Notalar, esler, ritim... Melodinin her bir parçası, flütçünün minik yardımcısına bir sinyal olarak hizmet ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat's movements, from the flicks of its tail to when and where it pushes the balls, obey its master's wordless commands with uncanny precision. The notes, the pauses, the rhythm — every part of the melody serves as a signal to the flute player's tiny assistant.{/n}
